wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Douglas Lawrence (September 12, 1921 – November 27, 2003) was a Canadian naturalist and wildlife author. He was an expert on the wildlife of Canada, on which he wrote more than thirty books, which have been published in 14 languages.

response: * R. D. Lawrence, Canadian naturalist and wildlife author
